body:
I need help. Like one on one

On Thu, Dec 10, 2020, 7:49 PM Carl Dong <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> After live-demo-ing a Guix build (which completed successfully!) on
> achow101's stream, I realized there were a few quality of life improvements
> which can be made to improve the user experience of our Guix build process.
> Here's a few of them.
>
> Notable changes:
>
>    1. When MAX_JOBS is specified, both guix time-machine and guix
>    environment will now build up to MAX_JOBS packages at a time when
>    creating the build environment
>    2. The instructions for using substitutes were incorrect, and has now
>    been replaced with a SUBSTITUTE_URLS environment variable, which works
>    well with shell's IFS splitting rules
>    3. New ADDITIONAL_GUIX_{COMMON,TIMEMACHINE}_FLAGS options, for better
>    customization of the build process.
>    4. README cleanup
>
> ------------------------------
> You can view, comment on, or merge this pull request online at:
>
>   https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20619
> Commit Summary
>
>    - guix: Make guix honor MAX_JOBS setting
>    - guix: Add SUBSTITUTE_URLS option
>    - guix: Add ADDITIONAL_GUIX_{COMMON,TIMEMACHINE}_FLAGS options
>    - guix: Remove README development environment section
>    - guix: Update HOSTS README entry for new architectures
>    - guix: Small updates to README wording
>    - docs: Symlink guix README to docs/ directory
>
> File Changes
>
>    - *M* contrib/guix/README.md
>    <https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20619/files#diff-ba90b155efb35350fcb7a49d3cfc7679df1d0869b2423d8c75978ffe6e2f9216>
>    (68)
>    - *M* contrib/guix/guix-build.sh
>    <https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20619/files#diff-5d372e27ea3aabeefe2356b8af938c188717145b6d068448f90675ada8675e59>
>    (42)
>    - *A* doc/guix.md
>    <https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20619/files#diff-bbfcd248d91d5ad673b3b94f178a71348aa0538343e2aab5a0e92c2299c614be>
>    (1)
>
> Patch Links:
>
>    - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20619.patch
>    - https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20619.diff
>
